p:
Insufficient political support for climate change was the second most common barrier in the open-ended responses, mentioned by 32% of the respondents ( n = 85). Interview participants echoed the relative importance of a lack of political leadership and political will:
And not sure it’s fair to say that it’s funding or lack of data that is a… hindrance… certainly those things are in some cases, but really this has been due to the lack of political will.
~State agency employee, Adirondacks
